items.name: The Creepypasta Universe Wiki
items.title: The Creepypasta Universe Wiki
items.headline: Welcome to the Creepypasta Universe Wiki!
items.desc: This wiki is about collecting the lore and backstories behind short internet horror stories called "Creepypastas." Unlike the Creepypasta Wiki, we don't revolve around the stories themselves; we revolve around the information of the stories. Basically, we're a horror encyclopedia revolving around a subset of the horror genre - Creepypasta! So if you're interested, know a lot of lore behind CP, and can provide us with good sources, come over - we could use all the help we can get!
